name: DJI Tello Quadcopter Drone with HD Camera
description1: DJI Tello Quadcopter Drone with HD Camera
description2: DJI Tello Quadcopter Drone is one of the most fun drones ever. Tello is an impressive little drone for kids and adults thatâ€™s a blast to fly and helps users learn about drones with coding education. Get yourself a Tello to find out just how awesome flying can be! The comes with some features like VR Headset Compatibility, DJI Flight Tech, Tello App and Controller Compatibility and many more.
description3: See the World from the Sky
description4: Whether youâ€™re at a park, in the office, or hanging out at home, you can always take off and experience the world from exciting new perspectives. Tello has two antennas that make video transmission extra stable and a high-capacity battery that offers impressively long flight times.
maxspeed: 140 kph; M mode: 39 m/s (27 m/s in Mainland China)
maxangularspeed: 0-100 kph: 2 s (in ideal conditions while flying in M mode)

name: DJI Mini SE Drone Combo DJI Mini SE Drone Combo Product Page After ImageDJI Mini SE Drone Combo
description2: DJI Mini SE Drone Combo is the ultimate companion for those who like travel photography. This compact drone has a 12-megapixel camera with which you can take stunning pictures and videos of 4000 x 3000 Still Image Size. It has a 2600 mAh battery that can fly in the sky for a maximum of 30 minutes when fully charged. With this drone, you can make any professional video and you can fly in the sky even in light air. This drone can be intuitively controlled with your mobile using the DJI Fly app. The camera on the drone has 1920 x 1080 Pixel Video Resolution. It has a 4 KM HD Video Transmission range. The minimum flight time is around 30 Minutes. The built-in Battery is a 2600 mAh 2S Type 7.2 Volt  Li-ion Battery. The Top Speed of the drone is 3 m/s in the S Mode while 1.8 m/s  in the P Mode and finally 1 m/s  at C Mode. This Drone can Move Up, Down, Forward, Backward while also turning Left, Right and Sideward during Flight. The maximum control Distance is 3000 M. It has a 1/2.3 CMOS Sensor at the side of the 12 MP Camera. Other features include GPS + GLONASS, 120Â°/s Maximum Control Speed, Single Shot Still Photography Modes. 4-1/8000s Electronic Shutter Speed. DJI Mini SE Drone Combo offers No Warranty
description3: See the World from the Sky
description4: Whether youâ€™re at a park, in the office, or hanging out at home, you can always take off and experience the world from exciting new perspectives. Tello has two antennas that make video transmission extra stable and a high-capacity battery that offers impressively long flight times.
